Title: User Create Content Media Service with Silverlight
Description:
UCCLight is a project which is for media service like YouTube. A user can select a video clip and upload to the UCCLight site. And then UCCLight will make the same video that is suitable for a service and thumbnail images for chapters of the video clip. Finally a user can see the new encoded video clip with Silverlight media player. 

UCCLight Project is using various technologies and products of Microsoft. ASP.NET, Silverlight2 beta2 and Expression Encoder 2 SDK are used. You can see the samples of those technologies.
HomeWiki:
DEMO Site: http://ucclight2.dotnetngene.kr/Contents/List.aspx (server in korea)
